```{r,echo=F}
Welcome = rio::import("cv.xlsx", sheet = "Intro")$Welcome

Welcome_tags = htmltools::tagList()

for (i in 1:length(Welcome)) {
  if (!is.na(Welcome[i])){
    Welcome_tags[[i]] <- htmltools::HTML(paste0("<p class='primary-links'>",Welcome[i],"</p>"))
  }
}
```
